mapper.sql: select st.study_no, st.title, st.content, st.area, st.category, st.register_date, st.view_count, st.max_member, st.start_date, st.end_date, st.del_status, st.price, st.status, (select count(*) from interest where study_no=st.study_no) likes, (select count(*) from study_member where study_no=st.study_no and status=1) members, m.member_no writer_no, m.name writer_name, m.nickname writer_nickname, m.email writer_email from study st inner join member m on st.member_no=m.member_no
mapper.select: select st.study_no, st.title, st.content, st.area, st.category, st.register_date, st.view_count, st.max_member, st.start_date, st.end_date, st.del_status, st.price, st.status, (select count(*) from interest i where i.study_no=st.study_no) likes, (select count(*) from study_member sm where sm.study_no=st.study_no and sm.status=1) members, m.member_no writer_no, m.name writer_name, m.nickname writer_nickname, m.email writer_email from study st inner join member m on st.member_no=m.member_no where price >=#{low} and price<=#{high} and st.del_status != 2 order by st.study_no asc

select st.study_no, st.title, st.content, st.area, st.category, st.register_date, st.view_count, st.max_member, st.start_date, st.end_date, st.del_status, st.price, st.status, (select count(*) from interest i where i.study_no=st.study_no) likes, (select count(*) from study_member sm where sm.study_no=st.study_no and sm.status=1) members, m.member_no writer_no, m.name writer_name, m.nickname writer_nickname, m.email writer_email from study st inner join member m on st.member_no=m.member_no where price >=#{low} and price<=#{high} and st.del_status != 2 and category=#{category} order by st.study_no asc
where st.title like (concat('%',#{keyword},'%')) or st.content like (concat('%',#{keyword},'%'))
mapper.update: update study set title=#{title}, content=#{content}, area=#{area}, category=#{category}, view_count=#{viewCount}, max_member=#{maxMembers}, start_date=#{startDate}, end_date=#{endDate}, del_status=#{deleteStatus}, price=#{price}, status=#{studyStatus} where study_no=#{no}
mapper.select: select st.study_no, st.title, st.content, st.area, st.category, st.register_date, st.view_count, st.max_member, st.start_date, st.end_date, st.del_status, st.price, st.status, (select count(*) from interest where study_no=st.study_no) likes, (select count(*) from study_member where study_no=st.study_no and status=1) members, m.member_no writer_no, m.name writer_name, m.nickname writer_nickname, m.email writer_email from study st left outer join interest i on st.study_no=i.study_no inner join member m on m.member_no=st.member_no where i.member_no=#{memberNo} and price >=#{low} and price<=#{high} and st.del_status != 2 order by st.study_no asc
select count(*) from interest where member_no=#{memberNo} and study_no=#{studyNo}
mapper.delete: delete from interest where member_no=#{memberNo} and study_no=#{studyNo}
